```{r package}
library (tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lavaan)
library(mediation)
library(psych)
library(kniter)
data(jobs)
```


```{r cleaning}
jobs_clean=jobs %>%
  mutate(sex=as.factor(sex), 
         comply=as.factor(comply),
         job_dich=as.factor(job_dich),
         job_disc=as.factor(job_disc),
         nonwhite=case_when(nonwhite=="non.white1" ~ 1, TRUE ~0),
         across(c("depress2", "age", "job_seek"), round, 2)
         ) %>% 
  select(-control)%>%  
  drop_na()

summary(jobs)
str(jobs)
cov(jobs)

## Codebook: https://search.r-project.org/CRAN/refmans/mediation/html/jobs.html
```

```{r SEM fitting}
# Measurement model
depress2 =~ measured_var_1 + measured_var_2


```
